Texts.Chs: 正如承诺的那样，你的奖励。希望这些^green;现金^reset;能帮上你的忙！
Texts.Eng: As promised, your reward. May this ^green;cash^reset; serve you well!

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;高级筛粉机^reset;带给^green;科学家^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Powder Sifter^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我听说过一种叫^orange;高级筛粉机^reset;的机器，但我从来没见过它。在你的^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;中建造一台并带给我，完事后也许我会帮你弄清楚。
Texts.Eng: I've heard of ^orange;Powder Sifters^reset; before but have never seen one in action. Build one in a ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me, and maybe I'll help you out.
